songs.title: The A Team (KOAN Sound Remix)
songs.lyrics:
The angel will die
Closed eye
This time, we’ll fade out tonight
We don’t wanna go outside, tonight
And in a pipe, she flies to the motherland
It’s too cold outside
For angels to fly

Angel will die
Closed eye
This time, we’ll fade out tonight
We don’t wanna go outside, tonight
And in a pipe, she flies to the motherland
It’s too cold outside
For angels to fly

And they say
They scream
They see
Slowly sinking, wasting
And they say
They scream
They see
Slowly sinking, wasting

An angel will die
Closed eye
This time, we’ll fade out tonight
We don’t wanna go outside, tonight
And in a pipe, she flies to the motherland
It’s too cold outside
For angels to fly
For angels to fly
To fly
To fly
Or angels to die
